alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 9:07PM AKST until February 22 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow, and blowing snow occuring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. In addition, areas of poor visibility are expected. Additional snow accumulations 4 to 6 inches expected. Freezing rain possible this evening with ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys. * WHEN...Until noon Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 30 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Heaviest snowfall around Kaltag and Ruby. freezing rain possible this evening south of Ruby. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
